task:
Fix the 3 failing tests + 1 panic in internal/cli/process_test.go:

1. TestNewProcess_InitializesSession - SessionID not captured from system.init message
2. TestNewProcess_ResumeSession - Same root cause (session ID extraction)
3. TestProcess_ReceiveOnlyOnce - Expects error on second Receive() call but gets nil
4. Panic in TestProcess_ReceiveOnlyOnce - Nil pointer dereference at line 340

Root cause is in internal/cli/process.go - session ID extraction logic and Receive() not being idempotent.

Run tests with: go test ./internal/cli/...
success_criteria: All tests pass: go test ./internal/cli/... returns 0 exit code with no failures or panics
